title: 37: No Such Thing As The Kevin Olympics
content: Dan (@schreiberland), James (@jamesharkin), Andy (@andrewhunterm) and Anna (@nosuchthing) discuss volcano cremation, the world's oldest spider web, prison newspapers, the emergency Olympic Games, and what happens if you kill the pope.
contentSnippet: Dan (@schreiberland), James (@jamesharkin), Andy (@andrewhunterm) and Anna (@nosuchthing) discuss volcano cremation, the world's oldest spider web, prison newspapers, the emergency Olympic Games, and what happens if you kill the pope.
